meanings.definition: A person who receives help or advantage from something.
meanings.sent1: The benefiter was grateful for the assistance.
meanings.sent2: The student was a benefiter of the scholarship program.
meanings.sent3: The little girl giggled, feeling like a lucky benefiter of the magic trick.
meanings.sent4: As a benefiter of the mentorship program, he blossomed into a confident leader.
meanings.sent5: The benefiter of the charity's support beamed with joy.

meanings.definition: To receive help or advantage from something.
meanings.sent1: She will benefiter greatly from the new training program.
meanings.sent2: The community will benefiter from the upcoming infrastructure improvements.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to benefiter from the extra attention, purring contently.
meanings.sent4: His creativity benefitered from the peaceful surroundings, leading to inspired work.
meanings.sent5: The plant benefitered from the sunlight, growing tall and strong.
